## fromAscii() function

Should be called to get hex representation (prefixed by 0x) of ascii string

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function fromAscii(str: string, num?: number): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  str | string |  |
|  num | number |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

string
